childMarkdownRemark.html:
Hennepin Made was founded in Minneapolis in 2011 through the partnership of Joe Limpert and Jackson Schwartz with the common belief that handmade products have an essential place in our culture and everyday life.

We infuse meaning into our objects through craftsmanship, detailed design, the history of the product, and a unique heritage that we are building on with each passing day.

internal.content:
__Hennepin Made__ was founded in Minneapolis in 2011 through the partnership of Joe Limpert and Jackson Schwartz with the common belief that handmade products have an essential place in our culture and everyday life.

We infuse meaning into our objects through craftsmanship, detailed design, the history of the product, and a unique heritage that we are building on with each passing day.

siteMetadata.title: Loop Architectural Materials
siteMetadata.description: Design & technical partner to the Arizona A+D community, Loop Architectural Materials represents leading brands in contract furniture, glass, and architectural/interior design products.
